
═══════ NattyUI: 3/4-bit Color Support ═══════

black           sample text     bright_black    sample text 
red             sample text     bright_red      sample text 
green           sample text     bright_green    sample text 
yellow          sample text     bright_yellow   sample text 
blue            sample text     bright_blue     sample text 
magenta         sample text     bright_magenta  sample text 
cyan            sample text     bright_cyan     sample text 
white           sample text     bright_white    sample text
